AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.subtitle: Get to know me
AboutMe.text_content:
Mid-Level Front-End Developer with over 4 years of experience in e-commerce and blogs, I am seeking new opportunities, preferably in a home office model. I am open to diverse projects, such as application development, software, and databases, as well as roles in back-end or full-stack positions.

I have expertise in modern technologies such as React, Next.js, and GraphQL, as well as practices like Clean Code, TDD, and integrations with RESTful APIs. I value teamwork, self-management, and mentoring, always focusing on delivering efficient and high-impact solutions.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.subtitle: Welcome to my online portfolio! I would like to clarify some information about the elements and inspiration used in the development of this website.

1.title: Exclusive Development
1.content: This website was fully developed by me from scratch, based on my skills and creativity as a developer. The layout was inspired by the Space template, available on Colorlib. No code or resources from the original template were directly reused; the design served solely as a reference for creating something unique.

2.title: Graphic Elements
2.content:
The decorative wavy lines beneath the section titles were sourced from the resource 'Wavy Line Isolated on White Background,' available on Vecteezy These elements were incorporated in compliance with the platform's usage terms.

The icons used were sourced from Heroicons, an open-source icon library widely known for its versatility and minimalist design. These icons were used in compliance with the permissions and licenses provided by the platform.

3.title: Acknowledgments and Licenses
3.content: The visual elements used on the site, such as the wavy lines, are properly credited and used according to the terms provided by their creators. I extend my gratitude to the creators and platforms for offering valuable resources to the community.

4.title: Contact
4.content: If you have any questions about the development of this website or need further information about the elements used, feel free to reach out through the contact form provided.
